resources.string: You haven\'t added any friends yet
Unexpected error happened when loading weather

We value your privacy and care about protecting your data. Please read about what data we collect and how we use it.

1. What data we collect:

Account information: email address registered with your Google account

Geolocation: inaccurate geolocation once every 60 minutes

Device data: tokens for push notifications

2. How we use data:

To display weather near friends

To send notifications

3. Who we share data with:

Services necessary for the application to work: Google Firebase (for notifications) and WeatherApi.com (for weather)

4. Managing your data:

You can disable notifications and geolocation in the application settings

5. Contacts:

For privacy questions, write to: alex.bogdanov05@mail.ru

Effective date: January 23, 2026

By using our application, you agree to these terms.

1. Who can use:

Users from 0 years old

Users who agree to these terms

2. Limitation of liability:

Weather data is provided "as is". The developer is not responsible for its accuracy and decisions made based on this data.

The application may contain errors or temporary malfunctions.

3. User rights and obligations:

Not to use the application for illegal purposes

Not to publish other people's personal data without consent

4. Developer rights:

To make changes to the application and terms of use

To block users for violations of the rules
